blogs.title: Learning Flutter
blogs.body: Flutter is an open-source UI software development kit created by Google for building natively compiled applications.
blogs.author: Jane Smith

blogs.title: React Fundamentals
blogs.body: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It's based on components, which are the building blocks of your app.
blogs.author: Alice Brown

blogs.title: Node.js for Beginners
blogs.body: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine, designed to build scalable network applications.
blogs.author: Bob Johnson
